title: Executive Order 7490-Reservoir Site Restoration No. 16, Revoking in Part the Executive Order of June 8, 1926, Creating Reservoir Site Reserve No. 17
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, the Executive Order of June 8, 1926, creating Reservoir Site Reserve No. 17, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands:
T. 1 N., R. 14 E.,   Sec. 28, N½ NE¼ NE¼, W½ SE¼, SE¼ SE¼;   Sec. 33, N½ NE¼, SW¼ NE¼.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7490-Reservoir Site Restoration No. 16, Revoking in Part the Executive Order of June 8, 1926, Creating Reservoir Site Reserve No. 17 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/356191
